name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Traditional Italian pasta dish with meat sauce and Parmesan cheese.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: Fresh greens topped with grilled chicken, tomatoes, cucumbers, and balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and special sauce, served with fries.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Crispy fish fillets wrapped in soft tortillas with slaw and chipotle mayo.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken and fettuccine pasta.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Plant-based burger with lettuce, tomato, pickles, and vegan mayo, served with sweet potato fries.
